<p>Normal <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>120</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mn>80</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">120 / 80</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">120/80</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>Generally considered high <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>140</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mn>90</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">&gt;140 / 90</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.5782em; vertical-align: -0.0391em;"></span><span class="mrel">&gt;</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">140/90</span></span></span></span></span></p>

style="text-align: left;"></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left;"></td><td style="text-align: left;"></td><td style="text-align: left;"></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>Tidal volunne 500 mL</p>
<p>Dead space 150 mL</p>
<p>Alveolar ventilation <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>15</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>500</mn><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>150</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5.25</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">15(500-150) \mathrm{mL}=5.25 \mathrm{~L} / \mathrm{min}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">15</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">500</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">âˆ’</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">150</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">mL</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">5.25</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm">L</span></span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">min</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>Blood count</p>

<div data-testid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="energy-sources-in-the-diet">Energy sources in the diet<span data-testid="stHeaderActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#energy-sources-in-the-diet" class="st-emotion-cache-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div>
<p>1 kilocalorie (kcal) <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.182</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">=4.182</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.3669em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">4.182</span></span></span></span></span> kilojoules (kj) 1 kilojoule <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.24</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">=0.24</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.3669em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">0.24</span></span></span></span></span> kilocalories</p>
<p>Energy source Energy released</p>
<p>Carbohydrate <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>1</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">1 \mathrm{~g}=17 \mathrm{~kJ}=4 \mathrm{kcal}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8389em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm" style="margin-right: 0.01389em;">g</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord">17</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm">kJ</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord">4</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">kcal</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>Protein <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mn>1</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\quad 1 \mathrm{~g}=17 \mathrm{~kJ}=4 \mathrm{kcal}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8389em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm" style="margin-right: 0.01389em;">g</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord">17</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm">kJ</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord">4</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">kcal</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>Fat <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mn>1</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>38</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\quad 1 \mathrm{~g}=38 \mathrm{~kJ}=9 \mathrm{kcal}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8389em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm" style="margin-right: 0.01389em;">g</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord">38</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm">kJ</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord">9</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">kcal</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<div data-testid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="urine">Urine<span data-testid="stHeaderActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#urine" class="st-emotion-cache-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div>
<p>Specific gravity: 1.020-1.030 Volume excreted: 1000-1500 mL/ day
Glucose: normally absent, but appears in urine when blood glucose levels are <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">&gt;9</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.5782em; vertical-align: -0.0391em;"></span><span class="mrel">&gt;</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">9</span></span></span></span></span> <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\mathrm{mmol} / \mathrm{L}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">mmol</span></span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord mathrm">L</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<div data-testid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="body-temperatures">Body temperatures<span data-testid="stHeaderActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#body-temperatures" class="st-emotion-cache-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div>
<p>Status <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mspace width="1em"></mspace></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\quad</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0em;"></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span></span></span></span></span> Temperature</p>
<p>Normal <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mspace width="1em"></mspace><msup><mn>36.8</mn><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">âˆ˜</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\quad 36.8^{\circ} \mathrm{C}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span><span class="mord">36.</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">8</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.6741em;"><span style="top: -3.063em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">âˆ˜</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord mathrm">C</span></span></span></span></span> : axillary</p>
<p>Flypothermia <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mo>&lt;</mo><msup><mn>35</mn><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">âˆ˜</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\quad&lt;35^{\circ} \mathrm{C}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.5782em; vertical-align: -0.0391em;"></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span><span class="mrel">&lt;</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">5</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.6741em;"><span style="top: -3.063em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">âˆ˜</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord mathrm">C</span></span></span></span></span> : core temperature</p>
<p>Death when below <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msup><mn>25</mn><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">âˆ˜</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">25^{\circ} \mathrm{C}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">5</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.6741em;"><span style="top: -3.063em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">âˆ˜</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord mathrm">C</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<div data-testid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="cerebrospinal-fluid-pressure">Cerebrospinal fluid pressure<span data-testid="stHeaderActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#cerebrospinal-fluid-pressure" class="st-emotion-cache-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div>
<p>Lying on the side: <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>60</mn><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">60-180 \mathrm{~mm} \mathrm{H} 2 \mathrm{O}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.7278em; vertical-align: -0.0833em;"></span><span class="mord">60</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">âˆ’</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord">180</span><span class="mord"><span class="mspace nobreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord mathrm">mm</span></span><span class="mord mathrm">H</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mord mathrm">O</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<div data-testid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="intraocular-pressure">Intraocular pressure<span data-testid="stHeaderActionElements" class="st-emotion-cache-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#intraocular-pressure" class="st-emotion-cache-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div>
<p>I. <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>2.6</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>20</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">3-2.6 \mathrm{kPa}(10-20 \mathrm{mmHg})</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.7278em; vertical-align: -0.0833em;"></span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">âˆ’</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">2.6</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm">kPa</span></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">10</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">âˆ’</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">20</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathrm" style="margin-right: 0.01389em;">mmHg</span></span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<table><thead><tr><th>Cell type</th><th>SI units</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Leukocytes</td><td><span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math
